name: Nick Lombardi
description: Hi! My name is Nick Lombardi, and I’m a founder at Blockstreet.io, a non-profit, open-source blockchain news, price, and education site. If you are interested in learning more about Cryptocurrency & Blockchain technology, checkout out our education section where we explain complex topics in a simple way for a non-technical audience.
